messages.error_in_keydata: The key must consist of latin letters and numbers.
messages.error_in_img: Please, select an icon from the list.

keydata.helpText: latin and numbers only. We recommend to create a master key to include it in all further QRpg-codes.

consists_of.helpText: players with all keys listed in here will gain this key automatically.

property_name.helpText: if a name is set, the key in a player's application will give a property to the character. This property label will be shown in player's module.

property_description.helpText: if a description is set, a click on a label in the player's module will toggle current text. You can format text with: **for bold**, __for italic__, [for image http-address], > for quote. Use a format: [#code_id] - to automatically insert another QRpg-code into the text. A click on this code will transfer user to it's description immediately. If you're adding links to mp3-files they will be replaced by a mp3-player automatically. If you add: [loop] - right after a link to a mp3-file, the file will be looped. Use a format: [conversation|user id] - to insert a form for sending a message to the user specified.

img.helpText: keys icons are automatically placed on QRpg-codes when generated and help players to understand whenever they are able to open the code or not.
